scripts.setup:win: py -3 -m venv backend\.venv && backend\.venv\Scripts\pip install -r backend\requirements.txt && backend\.venv\Scripts\python backend\seed.py && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.setup:posix: python3 -m venv backend/.venv && backend/.venv/bin/pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && backend/.venv/bin/python backend/seed.py && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.dev:win: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c blue,green "cd backend && .venv\Scripts\python app.py" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c blue,green "cd backend && .venv/bin/python app.py" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
